events.name: Texas A&M Windows 8 Hackathon
events.about:
We will contact you shortly after you signup with information on what to install on your machine to be prepared to participate.


Friday, February 1, 5:00 - 8:00 pm @ HRBB 124: Learn Tools & Best App Practices


Friday, 8:00 pm through Saturday, 2:30 pm @ HRBB 124: Hack!


Saturday, 2:30 pm @ HRBB 124: App Presentations & Winners Announced 


At 5pm we’ll give you an overview of what it takes to build a killer Windows 8 app, followed by an all night Hackathon. Polish your app and demo your skills ! 


Prizes will be awarded to the top 3 apps!
